The two adidas stores are very close.  One inside 1st floor of MyZeil mall and one on the street opposite to this mall.  Very easy to find them.  The shop inside mall is Adidas Original but it is small and the choice are limited.  For the ‚Ä¶

Excelent store. I had read the staff was very kind and attencious and.... that is compeltely true! Very nice people, they helped me with the size (I got exact the correct size in 3 days). The price is high, as it is in any Adidas store around the world.
Great staff with wonderful display and digital devices which help shopping experience

Varieties of options to choose from and located at the center of the city, along with many other stores, if you don't find what you were looking for, there is an option to check other stores just next door.
The saleswomen need to be more friendly, at least smile and greetings. I even bought shoes, but they acted like I didn‚Äôt exist when I walked out. Will definitely not coming back!

Lovely little store well managed and staffed. Hardly you won't find what you need and even so you can order online and pick it up in place. I was highly impressed by the customer service and kind attention. Top notch store.
The chief of the staff very professionnal,and spoke  very fluent english because ,i dont talk enough deutsch

The store is nice, well organized and positioned downtown with good access. The stock in store is not huge and feels somewhat limited. A big plus was finding the Adidas Originals pieces. Some of them look really good and I can recommend checking it out to any teenagers, young adults and any hipsters.

Cute store, amazing collections, prices are quite good during sales and they have a lot of choices for both men and women. Worth checking out during sales! Also the employees are pretty helpful and polite

Return policy is not stated anywhere and they don't except an undamaged product if it was tried out. Now I have 170‚Ç¨ shoes that don't fit. Maybe its the fault of the workers and not the company but its a horrible experience either way. Thanks a lot!

One of the best shopping places in the main shopping area in Frankfurt... Very helpful and friendly staff... Excellent service... I had a nice experience buying sport outfits... You can find big sizes... Two floors for ladies and men outfits and sport shoes... It is highly recommended!!!

Good selection of the latest Adidas gear. They didn't have my size in the Ultra Boosts I was looking for, but they didn't offer to look for it at other locations. The staff will do their job but won't provide great service.
Nice, patient personell, but limited range of products. Still, I found the shows I wanted.

The Adidas store on the Zeil has a large selection of sports clothing and shoes and many originals products. The staff is friendly and helpful, the prices are reasonable. The store is very centrally located directly opposite MyZeil and it is easy to find what you are looking for.
